data.name: Warhammer 40,000: Eternal Crusade - Mael Dannan Weapon Pack
data.detailed_description:
Do you know what it feels like to spawn a god? Are you sometimes too old for this mon-keigh excrement? Are the Orks on your lawn? Then the Mael Dannan pack increases the enjoyment of you and your friends in beautifully eviscerating and artistically executing any filth that stands in your way. The Mael Dannan Pack of weapons and armour for the Eldar Faction includes four items among the rarest that will turn your mind onto one thing - mael dannan – total and merciless extermination!These are visual customizations; they do not give any advantage beyond looking exquisite while freeing your enemies of unnecessary limbs. Since they're dead already.

The Silver Shuriken Pistol and the Silver Avenger Shuriken Catapult are only available in this DLC pack on Steam. The Ancestral Heavy Aspect Armour and its Right Shoulder are also available in the in-game store. They are only for Eldars.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10)
  • Processor: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 570 2.5GB or GTX 660 2GB or AMD HD7850 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Connection: 256 kbps upstream or faster. For more information about PC requirements, visit: http://www.systemrequirementslab.com/cyri/requirements/warhammer-40000-eternal-crusade/13067
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 780GTX or AMD R9 290X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Connection: 512 kbps upstream or faster. For more information about PC requirements, visit: http://www.systemrequirementslab.com/cyri/requirements/warhammer-40000-eternal-crusade/13067
